title: Services
subtitle: Choose Your Kitesurfing Adventure
description: From beginners to advanced riders, I offer personalized kitesurfing experiences tailored to your skill level and goals. All sessions include safety equipment and professional instruction.

services.name: Single Lesson
services.description: Perfect for beginners or those wanting to improve specific skills. Includes equipment, safety briefing, and personalized instruction.

services.name: Beginner Course
services.description: Complete foundation course for absolute beginners. Learn safety, kite control, body dragging, and water start in a structured program.

services.name: Remote Coaching
services.description: Personalized coaching program with video analysis, training plans, and ongoing support. Perfect for riders between sessions.

services.name: Kite Safari
services.description: Multi-day adventure exploring the best kitesurfing spots. Includes accommodation, transportation, and daily sessions.
